caseTitle: Collector of Customs, Model Customs Collectorate, Peshawar v. Wasifullah and another
tagline: Exemption of customs duty, sales tax and withholding tax on Import of <u>Hybrid Electric Vehicles (HEVs)</u>. The exemption clause is interpreted in favour of the assessee. Discussion on Pakistan Climate Change Act, 2017 and Pakistan Environmental Protection Act (PEPA), 1997. The technology of Hybrid Electric Vehicles is an alternative solution to resolve the issues related to vehicle emissions which contribute to formation of ground level ozone (smog) and toxic pollutants/airborne toxins.
